Property owners can enjoy the enviable personalised offerings of living."]

title_advert: ['EXCLUSIVE | 4 BEDROOM WITH MAIDS | PALMA']
descriptions:
["DescriptionAQUA Properties is proud to offer this exquisite 4-bedroom + maid room townhouse located in Palma Residences, The Palm Jumeirah. 
An open kitchen and tile countertops, roomy bedrooms, multiple wardrobes with a walk-in closet and two allocated parking spaces are just some of the features that make this unit desirable. 
Located in the proximity of Dubai's most popular areas, this property tenders to all its residents' needs.
Description:
* 4 Bedrooms
* Maid's room
* Fully fitted open kitchen
* Balcony
* Built-in wardrobes
* Storage room
* 2 allocated parking spaces
* Beach access
Palma Residences is a Nakheel development comprised of exclusive homes located on famous the Palm Jumeirah man-made island known for its high-end lifestyle. Most townhouses have a private beach which is perfect during the hot summer months in Dubai. This comfortable and cozy home makes its residents' busy lives extremely easy to navigate.
